verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:11
verses.text: Shall I then take my bread, and my water, and my flesh that I have killed for my shearers, and give it unto men, whom I know not whence they be?

verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:12
verses.text: So David’s young men turned their way, and went again, and came and told him all those sayings.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:13
verses.text: And David said unto his men, Gird ye on every man his sword. And they girded on every man his sword; and David also girded on his sword: and there went up after David about four hundred men; and two hundred abode by the stuff.
